definitions.text: beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
examples: her speech has a funny twang
they have some funny ideas about war
the peculiar aromatic odor of cloves
something definitely queer about this town

definitions.text: unique or specific to a person or thing or category
examples: the particular demands of the job
has a particular preference for Chinese art
a peculiar bond of sympathy between them
the special features of a computer

definitions.text: markedly different from the usual; ; -Virginia Woolf
examples: a peculiar hobby of stuffing and mounting bats
a man...feels it a peculiar insult to be taunted with cowardice by a woman

definitions.text: characteristic of one only; distinctive or special; - R.B.Taney
examples: the peculiar character of the Government of the U.S.
